tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE product_returns (
  return_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id UUID NOT NULL,
  return_reason TEXT,
  exchange_id UUID,
  return_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Exchanges (
   exchange_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   original_product_id INT,
   exchanged_product_id INT,
   exchange_date DATE,
   reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE product_returns (
  return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  return_reason VARCHAR(255),
  return_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE product_exchanges (
  exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  new_product_id INT,
  exchange_reason VARCHAR(255),
  exchange_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE return_patterns (
  pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  return_reason VARCHAR(255),
  return_count INT,
  pattern_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE exchange_patterns (
  pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  exchange_reason VARCHAR(255),
  exchange_count INT,
  pattern_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE return_rates (
  rate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  return_rate FLOAT,
  return_date DATE
)
